name: Robo Nanny
description:
You're a Robo Nanny, which means you're able to juggle keeping the baby asleep, cleaning up the nursery AND making sure you're juiced up on battery at all times. Finish your task list and you won't risk being turned into scrap metal! 

Controls:
W,A,S,D or arrow keys: movement
E: action
R: restart (only at the end of the game)

Note: done in the span of less than a day for Ludum Dare due to conflicting arrangements. Do excuse lack of music, the state of the graphics and overall roughness! 

Issues opening it in Mac? Follow these instruction: https://www.tekrevue.com/tip/gatekeeper-macos-sierra/

If you see an error message reading "Unable to find game!!" you may also need to drag the .app file into your Applications folder and launch from there. 

Credits: 
Dr.Zeus - Programming
Kalyrical - Art
